invite.cmdDescription: Envia o link de convite para adicionar o Bot.
invite.text: [Click here to add **Disco** to your server]({link})

help.cmdDescription: Shows a detailed list of all bot's commands.
help.notFound: {emoji} **{author}**, I didn't find no command with the specific name.
help.tip: Type **{command} <Command>** to see more details about a command.

ping.cmdDescription: Shows the latency between Disco's connection with Discord.

djrole.cmdDescription: Define the DJ role on your server.
djrole.reset: {emoji} **{author}**, you cleared the role **`Role DJ`** from this server.
djrole.update: {emoji} **{author}**, you defined the role **`{role}`** as `Role DJ`.

disablechannel.cmdDescription: Deactivate or activate a channel where the bot can be used.
disablechannel.allow: {emoji} **{author}**, gave me permission to be used in channel {channel}.
disablechannel.disallow: {emoji} **{author}**, gave me permission to not be used in channel {channel}.

disablerole.cmdDescription: Allows or disallows members with a specific role to use the bot.
disablerole.higherRole: {emoji} **{author}**, you can't deactivate a role which is bigger or equal to your highest role.
disablerole.enabled: {emoji} **{author}**, you gave me permission to be used by members with the role **`{role}`**.
disablerole.disabled: {emoji} **{author}**, you gave me permission to not be used by members with the role **`{role}`**.

localban.cmdDescription: Allows or disallows a member to use the bot in this server.
localban.higherMember: {emoji} **{author}**, you can't give a local ban to a member with a role which is bigger or equal to your highest role.
localban.unban: {emoji} **{author}**, you gave me permission to be used by the member **`{member}`** nesse servidor.
localban.ban: {emoji} **{author}**, you gave me permission not to be used by the member **`{member}`** nesse servidor.

disablecommand.cmdDescription: Allows or disallows that a specific command is used in the server.
disablecommand.enabled: {emoji} **{author}**, you allowed the use of the command **`{command}`** nesse servidor.
disablecommand.disabled: {emoji} **{author}**, you disabled the use of the command **`{command}`** nesse servidor.

botchannel.cmdDescription: Limits the use of the bot to a specific channel.
botchannel.reset: {emoji} **{author}**, you cleared the **`Bot Channel`** from this server.
botchannel.set: {emoji} **{author}**, you limited me to be set only on channel {channel}.

locale.cmdDescription: Changes the place/language of Disco's messages on your server.
locale.success: {emoji} **{author}**, you modified my language on this server for **`{locale}`**.

play.cmdDescription: Search and adds an specific track in the playlist.
play.noResults: {emoji} **{author}**, couldn't find any results for your search.
play.playlistAdded: {emoji} Added **{added}** tracks `({length})` from playlist **`{playlist}`** to the queue.
play.chooseOne: Type the number of the specific track you desire to listen

shuffle.cmdDescription: Shuffles the tracks in the queue.

repeat.cmdDescription: Creates a loop by repeating the music you're listening.
repeat.disable: {emoji} **{author}**, you disabled the loop on this track **`{track}`**.
repeat.enable: {emoji} **{author}**, you enabled the loop in this track **`{track}`**.

stop.cmdDescription: Clears the queue and disconnects the bot from voice channel.
stop.stopped: {emoji} Queue cleared and disconnect from channel **`{channel}`** as a request from **{author}**.

volume.cmdDescription: Increase or decrease the volume from the player.
volume.invalidValue: {emoji} **{author}**, you must specify a value between **`1`** and **`150`**.

pause.cmdDescription: Pauses or unpauses the current track.

remove.cmdDescription: Removes one specific track from the queue.
remove.removed: {emoji} **{author}**, you removed the track **`{track}`** from the queue.

nowplaying.cmdDescription: Shows details of the track currently playing.

skip.cmdDescription: Votes to skip the track currently playing.
skip.skippedByRequester: {emoji} The track **`{track}`** skipped by the one who added it. (**{author}**)
skip.voteAdded: {emoji} **{author}** voted to skip the current track. **`({votes}/3)`**
skip.skipped: {emoji} The track **`{track}`** was skipped as it achieved the necessary number of votes.

forceskip.cmdDescription: Forces to skip the track that is currently playing.

bassboost.cmdDescription: Enables or disables the Bass Boost mode (more bass).
bassboost.enabled: {emoji} **{author}** enabled the **`BASS BOOST`** mode. Feel the bass!

queue.cmdDescription: List all the tracks from the queue.
queue.name: Queue

reverse.cmdDescription: Inverts the tracks in the queue.
